title: It sucks watching these shout-casters make fun of non-meta picks
body: Watching teams pick non-meta champions is a huge reason why I watch worlds. And its just sad when players don't get taken seriously when they try something different.

replies.body: Are you talking about archies urgot or perks yasuo or?

It was very cool seeing archie lock in urgot twice tho. One time it be trollin, 2 times got me thinking

> [{quoted}](name=Lit Corn,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=iE5iYaAn,comment-id=00020000000100020000,timestamp=2017-10-18T22:09:50.656+0000)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lmUqNW3pAus

clearly shows it was fnc vs msf. wtf? anyways i was just referring to a kayn game i saw lol

I only go back to watch pro play to check out off meta picks
Irelia vs Olaf mid was hilarious btw
which game?
I think last years MSI or something Faker picked Olaf into Irelia mid. It was some international game where Faker picked Olaf mid as a counter. Don't remember what game though.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bX9u4MvNGnM
It was really funny because Faker was the first one to bring up Irelia mid, but now the opposing midlaner was trying to cheese Faker with his own strategy.
(Faker won hard)
Man, watching that game... Vayne not bursting enemies makes for such a superior viewer experience.
https://i.imgur.com/V6x6AVw.gif?b
Ah, I love Monte. Is that from a particular game where Teemo WAS locked in in LCK? If you know, can you link?
[(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AOjVPzqrOcw)]

Judging from the name of the file, I got that gif from maybe EloHell.net.

I have no idea what's the actual source.

I remember old Malzahar getting picked in EU LCS last year or the year before that and the casters were _vicious_. Legit I could not believe that people that are supposed to be professional casters were raging on the person playing Malz and the team picking him at all. Even when he did something good they'd still rag on him. I wish I could remember what game it was...

"viscous"
Don't you mean "vicious"? Casters (and humans in general) have non-liquid skin lol

Holy shit it's been a while since I've heard of old Malzahar. Hopefully it ended well with that pick.
I'm pretty sure they won that and that the Malz actually did contribute to the win but it really was terrible how they would not stop talking about how bad he was.
That's the mistaken assumption you're making: there's no such thing as "professional caster" when it comes to league. They're biased and favoritize all the time.

I think they're just excited by the non-meta picks. They don't know what to say about them, so they often end up making jokes due to the fact that they don't have anything useful to say. They don't know the match-ups of these champs so they can't talk about it. When they win with it, r, they really praise the non-meta pick (lucky nocturne) but, yeah, when they lose with it, they really trash talk them (poor Mordekaiser), while it's not just the champion that's good/bad but the comp and the execution.

I think it just depends what champ by what player.

I be damned if i ever see a shoutcaster shit talk uzi when he picks ezreal, regardless the meta

If the pick doesn't work, I don't see a reason for caster not to make fun of it. It's nothing on a personal(player)related level, it's just the fact that Riot needs to buff them/nerf op ones for them to get the proper spotlight.

That insane nocturne stomp was amazing.

I love Phreak because he's not like that <3

No one's making fun of anyone.
But if it's clearly out of the meta, they'd mention it. And i've never heard them talking about any pick in a bad manner, they always give at least one point towards the pick, no matter the position. But should they now question the said pick against the typical meta comp? That's the point of casters. They are there to lay out the possible strategies the teams may employ, for the viewers and give us pros and cons of them.
Its the only reason to watch worlds other wise nothing diffrent from season 4
I would have liked to see more teams once things were decided to just play fun games.   FB's last game had no impact on the standings whatsoever and only one fun pick was made across the board.
